thread.title: BRIEF-3D Systems Prevails In Accounting Trial For Former Employee's Violation Of Non Competition Covenant Court Orders Disgorgement

title: BRIEF-3D Systems Prevails In Accounting Trial For Former Employee's Violation Of Non Competition Covenant Court Orders Disgorgement

organizations.name: non competition covenant court orders disgorgement reuters

text:
April 13, 2018 / 12:26 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-3D Systems Prevails In Accounting Trial For Former Employee's Violation Of Non Competition Covenant Court Orders Disgorgement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - 3D Systems Corp: 
* 3D SYSTEMS PREVAILS IN ACCOUNTING TRIAL FOR FORMER EMPLOYEE’S VIOLATION OF NON-COMPETITION COVENANT; COURT ORDERS DISGORGEMENT 
* PREVAILED IN ACCOUNTING TRIAL FOR FORMER EMPLOYEE RON BARRANCO’S VIOLATION OF HIS NON-COMPETITION COVENANT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
